scripts.rename: node -e "require('fs').rename('out', 'public', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.build: next build && next export && npm run rename
scripts.deploy: next build && next export -o docs && git checkout -- docs/CNAME && git checkout -- docs/.nojekyll && git add docs && git commit -m "chore: regen site" && git push origin master
